description: This quick and easy risoni salad makes a lovely light lunch or picnic dish.
name: Tomato & Basil Risoni Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled and chopped into wedges
0.5 bunch basil, leaves picked and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Toss the onions and cherry tomatoes in a roasting tin with the oil and roast for 15 minutes.
Cook the risoni according to pack instructions and drain. Tip into a large bowl and add the roasted vegetables, sundried tomatoes, basil and torn mozzarella. Toss and serve warm or leave to cool.
